project.name: ClickSave
project.description: ClickSave is an Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) system written in Java specifically designed for interacting with ClickHouse databases. It provides a seamless interface for Java applications to interact with ClickHouse databases, allowing for efficient data manipulation, retrieval, and management. ClickSave simplifies the integration of ClickHouse databases into Java-based projects, offering developers a powerful toolset to work with ClickHouse databases within their applications.
